civic_grade_notes: All menstrual data must be opt-in with granular consent
No individual athlete identification in stored data
Cycle predictions are probabilistic, not deterministic
Data used exclusively for health-supportive research
menstrual_cycle_data.attribution: Menstrual cycle data provided by Terra Health API integration with Clue

civic_grade_notes: Device-specific consent required for each athlete
Biometric data anonymized before analysis
Sleep and recovery metrics support performance insights
No medical diagnosis or health advice provided
WHOOP recovery data highly relevant to cycle impact analysis
Strain scores provide objective performance measurement
All data processed with athlete privacy protection
Requires native iOS app implementation
Data remains on device unless explicitly shared
Highest level of user control over data sharing
Apple's privacy-first approach aligns with civic-grade standards
Official WNBA statistics with high accuracy
Player performance data used for health-supportive insights only
No discriminatory use of performance metrics
Transparent methodology for all statistical analysis
sportsdata_io.attribution: Official WNBA statistics provided by SportsData.io

civic_grade_notes: Most authoritative source for WNBA statistics
Direct from league operations and official scorekeeping
Public API requires respectful usage patterns
Must include proper attribution in all use
Weather data supports hydration research for athlete health
Environmental factors may correlate with cycle-related symptoms
Heat index calculations help assess performance conditions
No personal location tracking - arena coordinates only
Social sentiment used for population-level mood analysis only
Comprehensive bias detection and mitigation implemented
No individual profiling or targeting
Aggregated insights support understanding of social context
twitter_api.attribution: Public social media sentiment analysis via Twitter API

transparency.data_sourcing: All data sources documented with complete API information
transparency.processing_methods: All data transformations and algorithms documented
transparency.bias_detection: Algorithmic bias monitoring implemented across all sources
transparency.limitations: Known data quality issues and uncertainties clearly documented

privacy_first.anonymization: All personal identifiers anonymized before analysis
privacy_first.consent_management: Explicit opt-in consent required for all data usage
privacy_first.data_minimization: Only essential data collected for health research purposes
privacy_first.retention_limits: Data retained only for research duration, then deleted

ethical_usage.non_discrimination: No data used for athlete selection, exclusion, or discrimination
ethical_usage.health_supportive: All analysis focused on supporting athlete health and wellbeing
ethical_usage.research_only: Data used exclusively for academic and health research
ethical_usage.community_benefit: Research results shared for broader community benefit

scientific_integrity.reproducibility: All methods documented for research reproducibility
scientific_integrity.uncertainty_quantification: Statistical uncertainty included in all predictions
scientific_integrity.validation: Model validation and performance metrics transparently reported
scientific_integrity.peer_review: Research methods open to academic peer review

regulatory_compliance: HIPAA - Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
FERPA - Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act
ethical_guidelines: IEEE Standards for Ethical AI Design
ACM Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct
Responsible AI Guidelines for Sports Analytics

audit_requirements.data_processing_logs: Comprehensive logging of all data processing activities
audit_requirements.consent_tracking: Detailed records of athlete consent and withdrawal
audit_requirements.bias_monitoring: Regular algorithmic bias assessment and reporting
audit_requirements.security_audits: Regular security assessments of data handling practices

required_reading: ETHICS.md - Project ethical framework and guidelines
CONTRIBUTING.md - Technical and ethical contribution guidelines
data/schema.md - Data structure and privacy requirements
training_requirements: HIPAA Privacy Training (if handling health data)
Responsible AI and Bias Detection Training
API Terms of Service Compliance Training

code_review_process.ethical_review: All data processing code reviewed for ethical compliance
code_review_process.privacy_assessment: Privacy impact assessment for new data sources
code_review_process.bias_testing: Algorithmic bias testing required for model changes
code_review_process.documentation_standards: Comprehensive documentation of all data handling

alert_systems: API rate limit and quota monitoring
